content: Back in November, the google cloud healthcare team presented a demo around immunization recommendation app built using FHIR with machine learning and analytics. Related to this track, the last section has a FHIR export example to BigQuery, and some sample queries one can run. Please feel free to check out at https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/healthcare/tree/master/fhir/immunizations_demo/docs if you are interested.
